title: Frank Zappa - One Shot Deal (2008) Recorded 1972-1981
description:
â€œOne Shot Dealâ€, released in 2008, covers the meaty nine-year span of 1972 to 1981, and is undeniably fret-centric.

 â€œOne Shot Dealâ€ is taken from a number of disparate sources - including a pair of tunes from Zappa's "build reels." Itâ€™s an example of his â€˜xenochronyâ€™ technique.


â€œJust when you thought it was safe
to go back in the water . . .
Makes its own sauce!
Shocking summer surprise for no reason at all!â€



Frank Zappa

One Shot Deal

2008



CD / 2008 / VBR-V0



1. "Bathtub Man"  	Sep. 26, 1974, Palais des Sports, Paris, France


2. "Space Boogers" 	Nov. 8, 1974, Capitol Theatre, Passaic, New Jersey


3. "Hermitage" 	Sep. 18, 1975, Royce Hall, UCLA, Los Angeles


4. "Trudgin' Across the Tundra" Nov. 11, 1972, DAR Constitution Hall, Washington DC


5. "Occam's Razor" 	Mar. 21, 1979, Rhein-Neckar-Halle, Eppelheim, Germany; guitar solo from "Inca Roads"


6. "Heidelberg"  Feb. 24, 1978, Rhein-Neckar-Halle, Eppelheim, Germany; guitar solo from "Yo' Mama"

	
7. "The Illinois Enema Bandit" 	Oct. 31, 1981, The Palladium, New York City


8. "Australian Yellow Snow"  Jun. 25, 1973, Hordern Pavilion, Sydney, Australia	


9. "Rollo"  Sep. 18, 1975, Royce Hall, UCLA, Los Angeles
	



Frank Zappa

One Shot Deal

2008
